title: Central African Republic - Electric Transmission Lines
name: Central African Republic - Electric Transmission Lines
description: Data for medium and high voltage transmission lines were compiled for the AICD study led by the World Bank. A variety of sources were consulted, including regional power pool documents and maps from World Bank project documents. Locations are approximate, intended to reflect main connections, and are not representative of actual "path on the ground". The following attributes were collected: VOLTAGE_KV: Transmission line capacity in kilovolts, FROM_NM: Name of the locality where the link starts, TO_NM: Name of the locality where the link ends, STATUS: Status of link (Existing, Planned, Proposed, Under Study), SOURCES: Source of location or attribute information, PROJECT_NM: Name of project (planned links)

properties.SOURCES: WEC, 2008: How to make the Grand Inga Hydropower Project happen for Africa
WEC, 2008: How to make the Grand Inga Hydropower Project happen for Africa
